fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Write a rule new at night to apply to all messages sent the next day, except those sent by yourself.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The host may decide that your rule is not allowed to be used. You may make a new rule in this case.
- The host will notify all players of the first five messages that violate your rule, and no punishment is given. Afterwards, anyone who sends a violating rule is removed from the game and banned.
- Your rule applies to all chats, including whispers and private chats. Any message that violates your rule becomes public, so it may be wise to figure out the rule.
